name: If Only The World Was So Black & White
name_original: If Only The World Was So Black & White
description:
This was a submission for Global Game Jam 2022, site page here.

This is a 3D platformer that uses the high contrasts of black and white to create interesting platforming problems. The way forward requires you to switch colours to see ahead as they may be obscured by the background.

Adam Lutton - Design, Level Rigging, Sprite Art
Alex Hall - Programming, 3D Art

Made with Godot, Aseprite, & Blender.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - Run
